name: Temple Dog
description: The Temple Dog is a Medium Celestial creature known for its radiant jaws and powerful bite, featuring natural armor that grants it an Armor Class of 15. It has a sturdy build with a strong physique.
memorable: Features magic-enhanced bite attacks that deal additional radiant damage and can manipulate battlefield positions by pushing enemies away.
goals: To serve and protect, often found defending sacred locations or serving deities.
relations: May be encountered alongside priests or in temples dedicated to good-aligned deities.
environment: Typically found in temples or locations associated with good-aligned powers.
strengths: Immunity to poison and resistance to radiant damage and nonmagical attacks; advantages on saving throws against spells.
weaknesses: Lacks magical attacks and utilizes non-verbal communication, potentially limiting its tactics.
attacks: Employs two magical Bite attacks that deal piercing and additional radiant damage, with the potential to knock enemies prone.
most_powerful_ability: Radiant Jaws ability allows it to deal extra radiant damage with its bites, enhancing its offensive capabilities.
senses: Possesses darkvision extending 60 feet and a passive Perception score of 15, allowing it to spot hidden foes effectively.
skills: Proficient in Perception, with a +5 bonus, making it skillful at detecting threats.
additional_information: Has Magic Resistance granting advantage on saving throws against spells.
Protector's Instincts ability enhances initiative rolls when near a priest.
Rushing Bite ability allows it to push targets away after a successful charged attack.
Can grapple targets with its multiattack if both bites are successful.
Strong character of good alignment, aligning its behaviors with protective and celestial duties.
test_queries: guardian creature that bites and pushes
protective celestial with resistance to magic
temple dog with radiant bite attacks
